did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: International Seminar on Comparative Administrative Problems Related to Social and Economic Development. Records

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: In 1959, the National Planning Commission and the Institute of Public Administration in cooperation with the Congress for Cultural Freedom organized a Seminar on Comparative Administrative Problems Related to Social and Economic Development. The seminar was held from April 21 to 29 in Cairo and featured papers delivered by experts in Public Administration from Arab, European, and Asian countries.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: International Seminar on Comparative Administrative Problems Related to Social and Economic Development. Records, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: In 1959, the National Planning Commission and the Institute of Public Administration in cooperation with the Congress for Cultural Freedom organized a Seminar on Comparative Administrative Problems Related to Social and Economic Development. The seminar was held from April 21 to 29 in Cairo and featured papers delivered by experts in Public Administration from Arab, European, and Asian countries.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the announcement of the Seminar, the Inaugural Speech, and copies of the papers delivered at the Seminar.
